website_summaries.verdict: Formulated for men over 40 with 16 vitamins and minerals and a boost of B12 for increased energy.
pros: This organic, whole food multivitamin and multimineral supplement is designed for men over 40, encouraging a healthy prostate, overall general health, and a balanced metabolism
cons: Some report problems with the pills digesting fully
Select users have received broken bottles

customer_reviews.title: Huge price increase!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using since June 2019 and liked it overall and wanted to buy it again. But the price increase in 3.5 months was outrageous. I purchased 120 tablet for $33.04 and now it is $41.15 which is 25% increase!!! I could not believe my eyes when I saw it. Beware of sudden huge price increases. Who knows what you are going to be paying next month..
customer_reviews.author: ANIL ALPOGUNC

customer_reviews.title: I love them and feel I am in much better health ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking these for about three years now. Whole food vitamins are the way to go. I got my 51 year old brother and my 78 year old father hooked on these. They both admit a big difference in overall mind and body. I take mine on an empty stomach and there is no nasty burps or heartburn. I love them and feel I am in much better health with these in my system! Get them, and don't do the GNC Men's vitamins. They basically give you very expensive urine as most of the vitamins aren't processed and go to waste. Whole Food vitamins are amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My go to multi.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried and cycled through many brands of multivitamins. This one is my favorite and my go to. It has highly absorbable ingredients; it doesn’t make your urine neon colored like some multis do. I really appreciate that it is food based and has additional nutrients to address the needs of men over 40. The pills are relatively small for the amount of nutrients packed in per pill. I take one in the morning and one at night with meals. I’m generally healthy and have no nutrient deficiencies that I’m aware of so I take these for insurance rather than an energy burst. They suit my needs...I recommend them for anyone with similar purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Stomach Pain
customer_reviews.text: I have taken vitamins for 50 years without stomach issue as long as I ate food with them. I am in good health and don’t take any other medication. Something in these vitamins cause stomach pain. I stopped taking them and the pain left. I started them again and pain returned. Same scenario the third time. The reviews on these were so good so I decided to try these even though they were expensive at $50 a bottle. They are not worth the expense and pain and I went back to good ol $10 a bottle Centrum.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Scrivner

customer_reviews.title: received old stock (60 count); old formulation and incorrect label
customer_reviews.text: This is not a cheap multi. I opened the box before checking the label (hence I am not returning this__but I want to). The old formulation has too much chromium (150mcg which is now 500% of DV, not 130% as listed). A and E are listed in IU rather than mcg and folate does not have DFE indicated. I currently take Men's Once Daily (which has a current label) but this sort of thing makes me worried that GoL is slipping since the Nestle acquisition.
customer_reviews.author: whoiskermit

customer_reviews.title: The BEST vitamin on the market!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is the only vitamin product line out there that helps me with muscle cramping. With it being a plant based vitamin my body absorbs all of the nutrients that my body needs and allows me to be the best that I can be. I would recommend this product to anyone wanting a top notch vitamin.
customer_reviews.author: Tammi B.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I am in the process of returning this item. I took this vitamin, and about four hours later I went to the bathroom. Upon finishing I happened to glance into the bowl, I noticed the vitamin was still whole and intact. With that I began the return process. The seller was accommodating with no problems encountered.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Smells awful
customer_reviews.text: Recommend by a friend after I told him I purchased a multi-vitamin with iron at Target. He said DON"T trust their vitamins and recommended this one. It was 4 time more expensive and didn't contain iron. In addition to being a very large pill (hard to swallow), opening the bottle always made me gag because of the awful smell. I don't know about the effectiveness or "value for money" but am not back to a name brand at Target (with iron which was my doctor's recommendation to increase red blood cell production).
customer_reviews.author: Hardie

customer_reviews.title: This vitamin is sold for women and men. My husband and I both take it.
customer_reviews.text: We like everything about it. If you take the time to read the ingredients you will see it has everything you need to stay healthy. The tablet is a large one. It’s coated so it does go down easy. You will notice you just feel healthy and strong. It takes a few months to notice but you will notice. Buy the largest size you can get. Give it time. All good things take time.
customer_reviews.author: Shopping girl

customer_reviews.title: Organically Delicious
customer_reviews.text: Not literally delicious, because vitamins are kinda gross regardless—but they’re natural and free from the dangerous additives that products like the Centrum contain! Price aside, I’m so happy with these vitamins and what companies like this are contributing to the world. Thanks so much for making us healthier and supporting a better planet for everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Goodkat

customer_reviews.title: Great Product Delivered on Everything The Promised
customer_reviews.text: These vitamins are great. Whole Food and Organic. Exactly what I have wanted. There are many manufacturers who claim this but beware, they aren't always being honest about their sourcing. As an example many get their Vitamin D from irradiated lambs wool/lanolin.
customer_reviews.author: Woodchips

customer_reviews.title: May be it is good but, not recommended.
customer_reviews.text: It hurts my stomach badly and I stopped using it. I only use 3 times and each time I got a cramp on my stomach. I don't know what is the problem but it didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Murat

customer_reviews.title: A Welcome Whole-Food Multi-Vitamin
customer_reviews.text: This supplement is a dream come true. Finally a vegan non -GMO multivitamin that is whole food. The men's 40+ is two tablets per day but Garden of Life also has a men's once per day available for those who want to take one tablet per day. I prefer the two tablet men's 40+and I take one with breakfast and one at dinner. The men's once per day does not contain iodine so that plus a larger minimum daily amount of key vitamins and minerals was a no-brainer that I chose the 40+ multi vitamins. Also subscribe and save......wow perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: J. Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Just your daily vitamin
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking these vitamins for a long time now. I choose these vitamins because I can control the dosage. It requires 2 vitamins to get the entire amount on the label. So I just want half of that, I can just take 1 pill a day. And the dosage is already moderate to begin with, so I'm not over-consuming. And the vitamins are all natural in it's form and not synthetic.
customer_reviews.author: xmaschc

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend swears by these vitamins and will not switch. I have to order before he runs out because God forbid his misses a day he feels off. He loves these. I just ordered the raw iron by this brand cant wait to start them!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis aderman

customer_reviews.title: Good Product but Pills Broken
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product before and this one was economical compared with my previous source. However...Many of the pills were broken inside the jar. So I have to play mix and match to try to get the equivalent of one pill. If you want to save a few bucks and like jig-saw puzzles this seller's product might be for you.
customer_reviews.author: Tom M.

customer_reviews.title: Wrong capsule Count
customer_reviews.text: I’m very disappointed. I’ve just opened the bottle and found out that the bottle only contained 59 capsules! This is unacceptable!!! The company advertise having 120 capsules per bottle! This is a rip off!!!
customer_reviews.author: Matt Olson

customer_reviews.title: Great, but Nestle's 50% price hike is dubious.
customer_reviews.text: I love the option of a food-sourced organic multi, and have not seen signs of quality diminishing since Nestle took over the company. However, going from $33 to $47 a bottle since my last order is a bit disappointing. Still, not a totally unreasonable price to pay for such a valuable health resource.

customer_reviews.title: They Give Me the Strength of 1,000 Men
customer_reviews.text: I love these vitamins; they give me the strength of 1,000 men! When you take them, I would suggest that if you're taking other supplements that you take them separately for these; usually supplements contain things in them that make them absorb better and they may not mix well with whatever else you're taking. I would also spread the time when you take each of the two pills out as far as possible so that you do not overload you body with the entire day's worth all at once. Lastly, don't forget to take them with food, and only take them by mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Super ManTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: No folic acid and grey for MTHFR genetic mutation love this company and the organic
customer_reviews.text: I can't say I feel any direct effect from adding this to my already complex mix of vitamins and supplements however I discovered this after doing extensive research trying to find a multivitamin that does not have folic acid and helps to address those who have the MTHFR genetic mutation. It's one of the few multivitamins I've found that does not have folic acid and has the additional benefit of food-based folate which helps treat MTHFR. I love this company in general and I love the fact that this is all organic
customer_reviews.author: Eric McPherson

customer_reviews.title: WELL ROUNDED NUTRIENT DENSE
customer_reviews.text: Alot of great ingredients and nutrients. They could cut costs by decreasing the size of bottle that is one third filled.lol i did count them, they there. I did take a berberine after take the first. The dextrose, maltodextrin and potato starch are a no no of mine. They are not good for keeping blood sugars down. Kind of a kick in the pants to see that in there. But i wanted to try the product. So we will see.
customer_reviews.author: Ms W.

customer_reviews.title: Must refrigerate
customer_reviews.text: very difficult to store. the bottle is oversized and MUST be refrigerated. i took some out to travel with and the turned a very dark color and became sticky. the pills are also very large and hard to swallow. the taste and smell is standard for vitamins. they just raised prices by 20+% from around $40 to over $50. Supplements are such a profitable business. i guess i’ll be trying something else.
customer_reviews.author: TJ Ellington

customer_reviews.title: More ENERGY

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT TAKE!! ALLERGIC REACTION AND RED FLUSH OVER WHOLE BODY!

customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Tried many multis over the years and this one seems to be as advertised!!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I have been taking this product for a few weeks and I can tell the difference. They do not upset my stomach even if I take them on an empty stomach. I do take one pill in the morning and one pill in the afternoon so I don't know the effect of two pills at one time. I am pleased with the way I feel and the ingredients are top notch. I will see what happens after I take them longer. They are certainly not the cheapest multi but I feel WAY better on them than others I have taken. (Jarrow, Rainbow, LEF, NOW, Natural Factors, Country Life, and even Nature's Way)

Has all the necessary vitamins for Men over 40, including Prostate and Heart support. I only wish they were a little less expensive.

customer_reviews.title: Great vitamins!
customer_reviews.text: I've been on these for a few months now. They seem to be helping my energy levels and I'm pleased with them. They don't have a funny after tastes and they don't cause me to burp either. I "feel" that they have helped me out overall.
customer_reviews.author: Todd A. Hooper

customer_reviews.title: Did not like them
customer_reviews.text: I used these for a month but found my body did not react well to something in it. I don’t usually have any problems with eating almost anything- but there’s something in these vitamins that my system did not like. Discontinued using it.
customer_reviews.author: Craig A

customer_reviews.title: B12 - 1000% of Daily Value is too much!
customer_reviews.text: B12 - 1000% of Daily Value is too much in my view, this product causes issues with sleeping...I just wanted to buy a product that has vitamins/minerals that I need but unfortunately most of these products are overdose ingredients that "energize" and in reality I do not want that...
customer_reviews.author: J. M.

product_meta.title: Garden of Life mykind Organics Whole Food Multivitamin for Men 40+ 120 Tablets, Vegan Mens Multi for Health & Well-being Certified Organic Whole Food Vitamins & Minerals for Men Over 40 Mens Vitamins

VITAMINS AND MINERALS: Our vegan multivitamin has 16 vitamins and minerals at 100 Percent DV or higher; Supports vision health
PROSTATE SUPPLEMENT: mykind's vegan multivitamin for men 40+ includes folate and manganese for prostate health, chromium for healthy metabolism and B 12 for energy
METHYLCOBALAMIN: This men's vitamin keeps your energy and metabolism up with 1000 percent Daily Value of Vitamin B12
CERTIFIED ORGANIC MULTIVITAMIN: Vegan, gluten free, non GMO verified whole food multivitamin with NO synthetic binders or fillers; Supports heart health
